directions: Mix 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons powdered chocolate drink mix, flour, and salt together in a microwave-safe mug. Add water and olive oil; stir thoroughly until mixture is smooth.
Microwave mixture until center is fudgy and top looks dry, about 1 minute 55 seconds. Let cool for 2 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1/4 cup powdered chocolate drink mix (such as Nesquik®)
2 tablespoons powdered chocolate drink mix (such as Nesquik®)
title: Nesquik® Brownie in a Mug
